nodes.bodyText:
the last part to prevent spaces is incorrect, you need (?=\S+$),
^(?=.*[0-9])(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*[^a-zA-Z0-9])(?=\S+$).{8,64}$
Replacing \\ with \ gives compilation error - Invalid escape sequence (valid ones are  \b  \t  \n  \f  \r  \"  \'  \\ )
please also add a test where length > 64
